title: Fall Open House
description: Come experience what UOIT is all about! Meet current students, faculty and staff; attend faculty information sessions; visit labs and experience why more students are making UOIT their first choice. To register visit http://sites.uoit.ca/openhouse/

title: Offers of admission begin releasing
description: Offers of admission will begin to be released based on grade 11 marks. Offers will continue to be issued on a regular basis as grade 12 marks are received.

title: Deadline to submit applications to OUAC
description: Applications received after this date will still be processed by OUAC and distributed to the universities. However, specific institutional deadlines will apply.

title: Deadline to apply for Chancellor's, President's and Founder's scholarships
description: Deadline to apply for the following: Chancellor's Scholarship, President's Scholarship and Founder's Scholarship

title: Winter Open House
description: Meet current students, faculty and staff; attend faculty information sessions; visit labs and experience why more students are making UOIT their first choice. to apply visit http://sites.uoit.ca/openhouse/

title: Deadline to submit FIRST Robotics Canada Scholarship Application
description: Meet current students, faculty and staff; attend faculty information sessions; visit labs and experience why more students are making UOIT their first choice.

title: Latest date to expect response from UOIT
description: Latest date secondary school applicants should expect an offer of admission, a refusal or a position on a wait list from UOIT

title: Deadline to accept offers of admission and apply for residence
description: Deadline for secondary school applicants to accept their offers of admission. Residence applications must be received by this date to guarantee a spot in residence. Apply at http://uoitrez.ca/

title: Deadline to submit tuition deposit
description: Applicants must first accept their offers through OUAC before they can pay their deposits.
